variant.p: Consequently, an entity’s primary users need information about:

li.p: the resources of the entity (assets), claims against the entity (liabilities and equity) and changes in those resources and claims (income and expenses); and
how efficiently and effectively the entity’s management and governing board have discharged their responsibility to use the entity’s resources.
